column2:
To cite package 'blockmodeling' in publications please use package citation and (at
least) one of the articles:

  Žiberna, Aleš (2007). Generalized blockmodeling of valued networks. Social
  Networks 29(1), 105-126.

  Žiberna, Aleš (2008). Direct and indirect approaches to blockmodeling of valued
  networks in terms of regular equivalence. Journal of Mathematical Sociology
  32(1), 57–84.

  Žiberna, Aleš (2014). Blockmodeling of multilevel networks. Social Networks 39,
  46–61. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.socnet.2014.04.002.

  Žiberna, Aleš (2023).  Generalized and Classical Blockmodeling of Valued
  Networks, R package version 1.1.5.
  Cugmas, Marjan (2023).  Generalized and Classical Blockmodeling of Valued
  Networks, R package version 1.1.5.

To see these entries in BibTeX format, use 'format(<citation>, bibtex=TRUE)', or
'toBibtex(.)'.
# First we need to extract the adjacency matrix in the matrix format from the karate graph object:
#if you want to keep weights you can use this
